data_lineage_gaps.description: Unclear data provenance and transformation history
data_lineage_gaps.supply_chain_impact: Unable to trace data quality issues to source

model_backdoors.description: Hidden functionality in ML models triggered by specific inputs

ai_system_dependency.description: Over-reliance on AI systems without human oversight
